description: Associates an Amazon Web Services Identity and Access Management (IAM) role with a DB instance. This command doesn't apply to RDS Custom.

parameters.name: DBInstanceIdentifier
parameters.description: The name of the DB instance to associate the IAM role with.

parameters.name: RoleArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role to associate with the DB instance, for example arn:aws:iam::123456789012:role/AccessRole.

parameters.name: FeatureName
parameters.description: The name of the feature for the DB instance that the IAM role is to be associated with. For information about supported feature names, see  DBEngineVersion.
